edu.unm.health.biocomp.db

Class pg_utils

  • Object
    • pg_utils

  • public class pg_utils
extends Object
    Static utility methods for PostgreSQL databases.
    Uses PostgreSQL JDBC driver (org.postgresql.Driver).
    Author:
    Jeremy J Yang
    See Also:
    DriverManager, Driver

    • Constructor Summary

      pg_utils()

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Connection dbConnect(String dbhost, Integer dbport, String dbid, String dbusr, String dbpw)
      Return PostgreSQL connection.
      static boolean execute(Connection dbcon, String sql)
      Executes SQL statement. Use this function for non-queries, UPDATE, INSERT, DELETE, CREATE.
      static ResultSet executeSql(Connection dbcon, String sql)
      Executes SQL statement. Normally use this function.
      static ResultSet executeSqlScrollable(Connection dbcon, String sql)
      Executes SQL statement. Use this function for scrollable ResultSet.
      static String serverStatusTxt(Connection dbcon)
      Return text with server status information.
